alertQuery.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats' and Name == 'avg_log_write_percent' | extend Tags = todynamic(Tags) | where tostring(Tags.['azm.ms/dcrId']) == '<YourDcrImmutableId>' | extend Instance = Tags.sql_instance, Database = Tags.database_name | summarize AggregatedValue = percentile(Val,95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), tostring(Instance), tostring(Database) //| where AggregatedValue > 95

alertDescription.value: Fired when Azure DB Log write utilization percentage exceeds the specified threshold. Looks at the 95th percentile value over 5 minutes, and if it exceeds the threshold over 3 consecutive time periods the alert is triggered. For more details on this metric, refer to [this document](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/relational-databases/system-dynamic-management-views/sys-dm-db-resource-stats-azure-sql-database?view=azuresqldb-current).
